```{=html}
<script>
function copyText(elementId) {
  var text = document.getElementById(elementId).innerText;
  navigator.clipboard.writeText(text).then(function() {
      alert("Copied: " + text);
  }, function(err) {
      console.error("Error copying text: ", err);
  });
}
</script>
```
